name: The Sea Cleaning Claw Machine
description:
Made for the SeaJam!

(Warning: Post processing might cause lag)

A short and simple game about cleaning the ocean from trash in the style of an arcade claw machine. 

However, this is just a video game, so if you really want to clean trash from the ocean, I suggest you donate to the #TeamSeas initiative hosted by Mark Rober and Mr. Beast (https://teamseas.org/).

How to play:

Use the <- and -> keys to move and the space key to drop the claw. Drop all the trash into the recycling pit to win!

Bonus Challenge: Try to get rid of all the trash in under a minute!
